summary: Completed testing of redesigned Fractal module UI with global Strategy Controls. Backend APIs working locally, frontend components implemented correctly but with API connectivity issues to production server.

connectivity_issues.impact: Frontend cannot connect to configured backend URL
connectivity_issues.note: Local backend on localhost:8002 is working perfectly with all APIs

integration_issues.flow: Strategy Summary and Forward Performance data loading
integration_issues.issue: Components stuck in 'Loading...' state due to production backend being down
integration_issues.root_cause: REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL points to unreachable production server

passed_tests: Global Strategy Control Panel renders correctly
Mode controls (Conservative/Balanced/Aggressive) are present and clickable
Horizon controls (7D/14D/30D) are present and clickable
Execution controls (Active/Shadow) are present and clickable
Strategy Summary component exists with correct data-testid
Forward Performance Compact component exists with correct data-testid
Forward Performance shows global settings in header (7D · Balanced · ACTIVE)
No local selectors found in Forward Performance component
All local backend APIs working (Strategy endpoint, Forward Equity endpoint)
Backend health check passes on localhost:8002
Strategy API returns correct data for all modes (conservative/balanced/aggressive)
Forward Equity API accepts all parameter combinations correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All local API endpoints working perfectly
success_percentage.frontend: 85% - UI components correctly implemented, controls working, but API integration blocked by backend connectivity

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Configure frontend to use local backend (localhost:8002) instead of production URL, or fix production server connectivity. Production backend URL (https://dxy-replay-pro.preview.emergentagent.com) returns 520 errors and is unreachable, while local backend on localhost:8002 is fully functional with all required APIs working.
